item.title: Unregulated Sexual Stimulants Flood West Africa
item.description: Unregulated sexual stimulants are flooding West Africa, posing major health risks that officials are scrambling to address.

item.title: Inside Trump’s Effort on Russia and Ukraine

item.title: Facing Trump’s Threats, Mexico and Canada Draw Closer. Will It Last?
item.description: Mexico and Canada have long viewed each other with indifference or even distrust. They’re now talking about teaming up.
